name: Proxmox Updates
description: Checks for available Proxmox and Debian package updates. Marks as ok if none are pending, fix if updates exist.
check_cmd: if command -v apt >/dev/null 2>&1; then apt update -qq >/dev/null 2>&1; COUNT=$(apt list --upgradable 2>/dev/null | grep -vc Listing); if [ "$COUNT" -eq 0 ]; then echo ok; else echo fix; fi; else echo ok; fi

verify_cmd: COUNT=$(apt list --upgradable 2>/dev/null | grep -vc Listing); if [ "$COUNT" -eq 0 ]; then echo ok; else echo fail; fi
